title: Self-Directed Learning Program Using SketchUp Make for Exploring 3D Geometry

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary geometry concepts, understanding of 2D shapes, and basic computer operation skills
context.additional_context: Flexible scheduling for working learners, with hands-on practice conducted on personal devices in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners accurately create 10 types of basic three-dimensional shapes using SketchUp Make's 3D modeling tools
Learners explain the structural characteristics of three-dimensional shapes at the analysis-integration (Level 4) of the van Hiele model
Learners propose 3D solutions applicable to real-world spatial problems (e.g., building structure design) through collaborative inquiry activities
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
